      Source​(FileCollector collector, java.lang.String dir, java.nio.file.Path path)
      The constructor is not supposed to be used from outside, only through the FileCollector which indeed is invoked only from Geci.generate().

    • Constructor Detail

      • Source

        public Source​(FileCollector collector,
              java.lang.String dir,
              java.nio.file.Path path)
        The constructor is not supposed to be used from outside, only through the FileCollector which indeed is invoked only from Geci.generate().
        Parameters:
        collector - the file collector that this source belongs to. Note that the type FileCollector is not expoted by the module and this prevents the usres of the module to use this constructor.
        dir - the directory of the source
        path - the path of the source
